creator: jaroslav.zaruba@gmail.com
text: Apache Monitor is added to applications to be run at OS start yet it merely yields an err message every time when UAC is on, because it has to be run with Administrator privileges.

The 2 Tomcat Windows exe files come from another project named Commons Daemon. The UAC issue with them are tracked there under

https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/DAEMON-245

Regards,

Rainer
creator: rainer.jung@kippdata.de
